definition: A person who holds a high academic position at a university or educational institution, typically specializing in a specific field of study. This term is commonly used to refer to individuals who teach and conduct research in higher education settings.

examples.german: Der Professor hält eine Vorlesung über Physik.
examples.english: The professor is giving a lecture on physics.

examples.german: Die Studenten haben den Professor um Rat gebeten.
examples.english: The students asked the professor for advice.

examples.german: Der Professor hat viele wissenschaftliche Veröffentlichungen.
examples.english: The professor has many scientific publications.
